summary: AN ORDINANCE Relating to the Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority ("Sound Transit"); authorizing execution of a "Second Supplement to the Memorandum of Agreement for Intergovernmental Cooperation for the Central Link Light Rail Transit Project;" increasing expenditure allowances in the 2000 budgets for various City Departments; adding positions (of which some will be exempt from Civil Service) in various departments and accepting funds and making reimbursable appropriations; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
